section.p: This specimen is for representing specimens obtained from a procedure

ol.li: specimenRole SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7716)
To indicate that the Procedure and the Results are referring to the same specimen, the Procedure/specimen/specimenRole/id SHOULD be set to equal an Organizer/specimen/ specimenRole/id. (CONF:7717)
Contains exactly one [1..1] specimenRole, where its type is Specimen Role
specimenRole SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7716)
To indicate that the Procedure and the Results are referring to the same specimen, the Procedure/specimen/specimenRole/id SHOULD be set to equal an Organizer/specimen/ specimenRole/id. (CONF:7717)
